title: Client Relationship Management System
shortDesc: A role-based CRM platform for real-time lead tracking, secure APIs, and seamless frontend-backend integration.
longDesc: Many businesses struggle to track leads and manage field agents in real time. I built a role-based CRM system with Django REST, React, and PostgreSQL to manage leads, track agents in real-time, and streamline operational workflows. This included secure authentication, REST APIs, and optimized database queries for fast access.

title: Real-Time Scene Graph Generation
shortDesc: YOLOv5-based framework to detect objects and their relationships in real time for robotics, AR/VR, and surveillance.
longDesc: Understanding object-object relationships in real time is computationally expensive. I developed a scene graph generation pipeline using YOLOv5, PAN-FPN, GloVe embeddings, and PyTorch for real-time object detection and relationship classification. The model achieved 14.5 mR@100 at 30 FPS, enabling real-world applications in robotics and AR/VR.

title: Continual Federated Learning for Speech Tasks (C-FLAG)
shortDesc: A privacy-preserving continual learning system for ASR on edge devices using Whisper-Tiny.
longDesc: Standard FL systems for Automatic Speech Recognition suffer from forgetting when exposed to new data over time. I designed C-FLAG — a gradient replay + aggregation method for continual federated learning — adapting Whisper-Tiny to support multilingual ASR on edge devices without centralizing speech data. Tested on Split CIFAR-10/100 and TinyImageNet benchmarks.
